Text:
Not working. Just opens up a cmd dialog saying "Invalid number of arguments: 0
Error: Exiting..."

Nevermind! It works :D
If anyone gets that error, just dont run from the shortcut on desktop. Run from the folder where you installed the game. (TheSwapper.exe)

Just kill the redist installations if you know have them then I rebooted because the installation got stuck even though it was done, now it works as intended.

Great game! Interesting setting and cool puzzles.
The game starts but the screen is fuzzy for some reason, I can't see whats happening in the game
